Summary: There was something wrong with Evan Buckley. Deep within his core, within the marrow of his bones, his blood ‚Äî he thirsted. His bones ached as if too big for his body and air burned his lungs, as if it were a foreign invader. OR Buck wakes up after losing consciousness during a call and wakes up with growing pains and an unexplainable craving.
